thread.title: Tesla aims to produce 6,000 Models 3s per week by June end - Electrek

title: Tesla aims to produce 6,000 Models 3s per week by June end - Electrek
text:
April 17, 2018 / 12:18 PM / Updated 30 minutes ago Tesla aims to produce 6,000 Models 3s per week by June end - Electrek Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - Tesla Inc ( TSLA.O ) is aiming to produce 6,000 Model 3 units per week by the end of June to achieve its target of 5,000 units per week after accounting for a margin of error, Electrek reported here , citing CEO Elon Musk's email to employees. FILE PHOTO: A Tesla Model 3 sedan, its first car aimed at the mass market, is displayed during its launch in Hawthorne, California, U.S. March 31, 2016. REUTERS/Joe White/File Photo 
The news comes a day after Tesla temporarily suspended its Model 3 assembly line in what the company said was a planned production pause. 
Tesla did not immediately respond to a request for comment. Reporting by Aishwarya Venugopal in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur
